Hi HubSpot Fam,

I noticed the hubdbrow field doesn’t permanently display the selected option. It shows up after selecting but defaults to ‘Table Row 1’..‘Table Row 2’..etc after refreshing . Is this a known bug or is there an additional configuration to make it permanently display? It’s a bit of a nuisance to click on the field to know what was selected.
